answerText: helium [or He] [10] This fusion reaction, which creates helium from the fusion of hydrogen without any other intermediates, is prevalent in stars of one solar mass or less.
heading: NASAT  |2014 | 5 | 14 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Pierre Janssen discovered this element in spectral lines of the Sun's chromosphere during a solar eclipse. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this second-most abundant element in the universe.
